SEARCH
Package generellSim

Class SimState

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
generellSim.SimState
Direct Known Subclasses:
SnabbköpTillstånd
public abstract class SimState extends Observable
Represents the general state of the simulation. It manages the simulation's running state and time. Observers are notified of changes, allowing for reactive updates in the simulation's view and other components.
Author:
Botzan Güzel, Sergij Wennströmm, Ludvig Lidén

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    SimState()
    Constructs a new simulation state, initially not running and with the simulation time set to zero.
